CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Account__r.Phone), "", HYPERLINK("tel:" & Account__r.Phone , "Telefoon","_self" ) ) & IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Account__r.Phone)), NOT(ISBLANK(Account__r.PersonContact.MobilePhone)) ), BR() & BR(), "" ) & IF( ISBLANK(Account__r.PersonContact.MobilePhone), "", HYPERLINK("tel:" & Account__r.PersonContact.MobilePhone , "Mobiel","_self" ) )
CustomField.label: Bel
